body:
I see, you are using the buggy code. The fix (https://go-review.googlesource.com/#/c/3504/) for parent issue (https://github.com/golang/go/issues/9697) was merged on Feb20. While go1.4.2 was released on Feb18. It seems go1.4.2 does not include the fix.

I tried with master branch - `go version devel +71bf182` and faced no such issue. I also tried with go1.4 and was able to reproduce.
